H0.text: Oceans and the Moon interact most in the water cycle.

H1.text: Oceans and the Sun interact most in the water cycle.

H2.text: Lakes and the Moon interact most in the water cycle.

H3.text: Lakes and the Sun are the two things that interact most in the water cycle.

A4.text: The water cycle is powered by the energy emitted from the sun.

A5.text: The ocean holds 97% of the total water on the planet; 86% of global evaporation occurs over the ocean.
